name: COVENCO, INC., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
LARSEN and PAPADAKOS, JJ., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COVENCO, INC., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
LARSEN and PAPADAKOS, JJ., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
McDERMOTT, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Robert E. Chemicoff, Keith Fickel, on brief, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Ronald H. Skubecz, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
607 A.2d 1077
COVENCO, INC., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 6, 1992.
Decided June 11, 1992.
Robert E. Chemicoff, Keith Fickel, on brief, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Ronald H. Skubecz, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
